page.title: 01Brenchley & Matfield Area.
page.content: The self-sufficient communities that grew in this part of the{ancient {wealden forest,}gradually changed with improved road transport and the introduction of the railway.{Farming} remains the dominant industry while many local trades and crafts have disappeared.{Cinderhill} is a reminder of the great{iron}industry that once flourished. The area is well-served by trains to {London}and easy access to{motorways. With few exceptions the population enjoys a pleasant life style living in modernised properties and converted {barns}and{oasts.}Old cottage{crafts } are being revived as hobbies,while the {church,clubs}and{associations}further enrich local life. A choice of good {school}and adequate{medical care, particularly for the young and old, make it a pleasant place to live.
